document.full_text: for the first time in a decade, not a single winner of the six major kentucky derby prep races earned a beyer speed figure of at least 100, considered the standard for a high-quality stakes champion.
document.title: derby field lacks speed of horses in the past
lines_and_colors: for the first time in a decade, not a single winner of the six major kentucky derby prep races earned a beyer speed figure of at least 100, considered the standard for a high-quality stakes champion.
